name: Advocate mentorship project

name: Chemistry
description: Related to or with applications in chemistry

description: Extends the Qiskit circuit library, implements a circuit transformation or analysis

description: Tools for converting Qiskit objects (such as QuantumCircuit) into other frameworks

name: Error mitigation
description: Tools or algorithms for mitigating errors

name: Finance
description: Related to or with applications in finance

description: Games or playful education resources that use Qiskit

name: Hardware
description: Related with quantum hardware design or quantum control

name: Julia

name: Machine learning
description: Related to or with applications in machine learning

name: Jupyter notebook
description: Uses or supports Jupyter notebooks

name: Openqasm
description: Supports OpenQASM as an exchange format

name: Optimization
description: Related to or with applications in optimization

name: Paper implementation
description: Implements ideas from peer-reviewed papers (owned or from third parties)

name: Partners
description: Software in maintained as part of the Qiskit Partnership Program

name: Physics
description: Related to or with applications in physics

name: Transpiler plugin
description: Transpiler or synthesis Qiskit plugin

name: Prototype
description: Software or tool written by the Qiskit prototypes team

name: Provider
